casebody.data:
MICHIGAN CATHOLIC CONFERENCE, et al., petitioners,
v.
Sylvia BURWELL, Secretary of Health and Human Services, et al. No. 14-701. Supreme Court of the United States April 27, 2015.

Opinion

On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit. Motion of Association of American Physicians and Surgeons, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit for further consideration in light of Burwell v. Hobby Lobby Stores, Inc., 573 U.S. ----, 134 S.Ct. 2751 , 189 L.Ed.2d 675 (2014).
